value.title: Day of Year and Day of Quarter   DAX calculations for Power BI

These calculations, however, are very simple and easy to implement using other functions. This short blog and video explain a method to calculate those

value.title: Build a P&L in Power BI Without Any DAX
value.excerpt: This is the third article where I have covered building a P&L in Power BI. My first 2 articles here and here focused on how to use the DAX language to solve some of the common problems with P&L reporting, such as adding sub totals into the visual, % of [...]Read More ¬ª
